##### FILE: hello_deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: hello
  name: hello-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: jluisalvarez/go_hello:2023
        name: go-hello
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---

##### FILE: hello_ingress_cert.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to helloword/Ingress/api-helloword:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt
  name: api-helloword
  namespace: helloword
spec:
  ingressClassName: traefik
  rules:
  - host: api.nolifelover.example
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: helloworld-http
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - api.nolifelover.example
    secretName: helloworld-http-tls

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: hello_k81.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hellok8s:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hellok8s
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hellok8s
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hellok8s
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: brianstorti/hellok8s:v4
        name: hellok8s-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: hellok8s-config
        name: config

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hellok8s
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hellok8s
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hellok8s

      containers:
      - envFrom:

##### FILE: hello_k8s1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hellok8s:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hellok8s
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hellok8s
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hellok8s
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MESSAGE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MESSAGE
              name: hellok8s-config
        image: brianstorti/hellok8s:v4
        name: hellok8s-container

---

##### FILE: hello_world_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: helloworld
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_URL
          value: mongodb://mongo:27017/dev
        image: igusarov/hello_world:1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

---

kind: ClusterRole

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: helloworld-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: helloworld-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: helloworld-operator
  name: helloworld-editor-role
  namespace: default

- apiGroups:
  - helloworld.example.com
  resources:
  - helloworlds
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - helloworld.example.com
  resources:
  - helloworlds/status
  verbs:
  - get

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
    version: v1
  name: helloworld-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/istio/examples-helloworld-v1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---

##### FILE: helloworld14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/aks-helloworld-one:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: aks-helloworld-one
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aks-helloworld-one
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aks-helloworld-one
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TITLE
          value: Welcome to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
        image: mcr.microsoft.com/azuredocs/aks-helloworld:v1
        name: aks-helloworld-one
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: helloworld15_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
    version: v1
  name: helloworld-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/istio/examples-helloworld-v1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---

##### FILE: helloworld16_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pod-affinity-2
  name: pod-affinity-2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-affinity-2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-affinity-2
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - pod-affinity-1
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port

---


Mutation:

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-affinity-3
  template:

      labels:
        app: pod-affinity-3
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - pod-affinity-1

##### FILE: helloworld16_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pod-affinity-4:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pod-affinity-4
  name: pod-affinity-4
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-affinity-4
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-affinity-4
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - pod-affinity-1
                - pod-affinity-3
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port

##### FILE: helloworld20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-world-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: hello-world
  name: hello-world-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ECHO_TEXT
          value: Hello from kubernetes
        image: hashicorp/http-echo
        name: hello-world
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 80m
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: helloworld20_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$1
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-forwarded-headers: "true"
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: public
  rules:
  - host: my-local-microk8s.local.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: hello-world
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /hello/(.*)
        pathType: Prefix

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: helloworld21.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pod-affinity-1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pod-affinity-1
  name: pod-affinity-1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-affinity-1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-affinity-1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

##### FILE: helloworld21_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pod-affinity-2
  name: pod-affinity-2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-affinity-2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-affinity-2
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - pod-affinity-1
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2 failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2 failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2 failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/pod-affinity-2 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

##### FILE: helloworld3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TEXT
          value: hello
        - name: NEXT
          value: world:8080
        image: wardviaene/http-echo
        name: hello
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/hello

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/hello
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/hello failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/hello failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/hello failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: world
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: world
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: world
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TEXT
          value: world
        - name: NEXT
          value: world-2:8080
        image: wardviaene/http-echo
        name: world
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
    version: v1
  name: helloworld-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/sail-dev/examples-helloworld-v1:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
  name: helloworld-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: regcred

---

##### FILE: helloworld-affinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
  name: helloworld-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: team
                operator: In
                values:
                - engineering-project1
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port

---

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: helloworld-affinity-with-tolerations.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-deployment-at:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
  name: helloworld-deployment-at
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: team
                operator: In
                values:
                - engineering-project1
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: app
        operator: Equal
        value: myapp

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: helloworld-affinity-with-tolerations1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-deployment-at:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
  name: helloworld-deployment-at
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: team
                operator: In
                values:
                - engineering-project1
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: app
        operator: Equal
        value: myapp

---

##### FILE: helloworld-backend-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to backend/Deployment/helloworld-backend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    helloworld: helloworld-backend-app
  name: helloworld-backend-deployment
  namespace: backend
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      helloworld: helloworld-backend-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helloworld: helloworld-backend-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: helloworld
                operator: In
                values:
                - helloworld-backend-app
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/helloworld-backend/k8
        name: helloworld-backend-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 400Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /helloworld/logs
          name: helloworld-backend-log-pvc
      volumes:
      - name: helloworld-backend-log-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: helloworld-backend-log-pvc
          readOnly: false

---

##### FILE: helloworld-backend-hpa.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to backend/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/helloworld-backend-deployment-hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: helloworld-backend-deployment-hpa
  namespace: backend
spec:
  maxReplicas: 2
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 50
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageValue: 370Mi
        type: AverageValue
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: helloworld-backend-deployment

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

  - ReadWriteMany
  capacity:
    storage: 25Gi
  nfs:

    server: 76.x.x.x

kind: Deployment

    app.kubernetes.io/name: hello-world
  name: hello-world
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: hello-world

    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: hello-world

        name: hello-world-container
        ports:

##### FILE: helloworld-dual-stack.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/helloworld:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
    service: helloworld
  name: helloworld
  namespace: default
spec:
  ipFamilies:
  - IPv6
  - IPv4
  ipFamilyPolicy: RequireDualStack
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 5000
  selector:
    app: helloworld

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
    version: v1
  name: helloworld-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/istio/examples-helloworld-v1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

##### FILE: helloworld-frontend-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to frontend/Deployment/helloworld-frontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    helloworld: helloworld-frontend-app
  name: helloworld-frontend-deployment
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      helloworld: helloworld-frontend-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helloworld: helloworld-frontend-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: helloworld
                operator: In
                values:
                - helloworld-frontend-app
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/helloworld/k8
        name: helloworld-frontend-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 250Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 200Mi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource frontend/Deployment/helloworld-frontend-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource frontend/Deployment/helloworld-frontend-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: helloworld-frontend-hpa.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to frontend/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/helloworld-frontend-hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: helloworld-frontend-hpa
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  maxReplicas: 4
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 50
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageValue: 180Mi
        type: AverageValue
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: helloworld-frontend-deployment

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-java-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-java-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-java-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: lalithma/java:one
        name: my-java-app-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        - containerPort: 4317
        - containerPort: 4318

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/ns1:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: ns1
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota

  name: default-resourcequota

    requests.memory: 16Gi

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-tls
  namespace: ns1

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello
        version: v1-tls
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TEXT
          value: hello
        - name: NEXT
          value: world.ns2:8080

        name: hello

  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/ns2:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: ns2
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange

  name: helloworld-ingress-v1
  namespace: default

  rules:
  - host: helloworld-v1.devss.xyz

      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: helloworld-v1
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: helloworld-v22.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-2-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld-2
  name: helloworld-2-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld-2
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld-2
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-v2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-v2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello
        version: v2
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TEXT
          value: hello, this is v2
        - name: NEXT
          value: world-2:8080
        image: wardviaene/http-echo
        name: hello
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http

---

##### FILE: helloworld-v3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-v3:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-v3
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello
        version: v3
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MY_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: TEXT
          value: hello, this is $(MY_POD_NAME)
        image: wardviaene/http-echo
        name: hello
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http

---

##### FILE: helloworld-v31.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-3-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld-3
  name: helloworld-3-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 6
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld-3
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld-3
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port

---

##### FILE: helloworld-with-bad-liveness-probe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-deployment-with-bad-liveness-probe:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: helloworld-deployment-with-bad-liveness-probe
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: karthequian/helloworld:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 90
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: node-feature-discovery

      protocol: UDP

        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to flux-system/ResourceQuota/critical-pods-flux-system:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: flux-system
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: flux
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.2.2
  name: critical-pods-flux-system
  namespace: flux-system
spec:
  hard:
    pods: "1000"
  scopeSelector:
    matchExpressions:
    - operator: In
      scopeName: PriorityClass
      values:
      - system-node-critical
      - system-cluster-critical

##### FILE: helm-controller_9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to flux-system/Deployment/helm-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: helm-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: flux-system
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: flux
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.2.2
    control-plane: controller
  name: helm-controller
  namespace: flux-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helm-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: helm-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --events-addr=
        - --watch-all-namespaces=true
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: ghcr.io/fluxcd/helm-controller:v0.37.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: helm-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 600
      tolerations:
      - key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

---

kind: ClusterRole
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/instance: flux-system

##### FILE: helm-controller1_9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to flux-system/Deployment/helm-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: helm-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: flux-system
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: flux
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.2.2
    control-plane: controller
  name: helm-controller
  namespace: flux-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helm-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: helm-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --events-addr=
        - --watch-all-namespaces=true
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: ghcr.io/fluxcd/helm-controller:v0.37.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: helm-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 600
      tolerations:
      - key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

---


Mutation:

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: helm-controller2_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helm-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: helm-controller
    control-plane: controller
  name: helm-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helm-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: helm-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --events-addr=http://notification-controller/
        - --watch-all-namespaces
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.cpu
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.memory
        image: fluxcd/helm-controller:v1.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: helm-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 600
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

---

            - ALL

##### FILE: helm-controller8_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helm-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: helm-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: flux
    control-plane: controller
  name: helm-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helm-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: helm-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --events-addr=http://notification-controller.flux-system.svc.cluster.local./
        - --watch-all-namespaces
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.cpu
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.memory
        image: fluxcd/helm-controller:v1.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: helm-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 600
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/helm-controller
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/helm-controller failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/helm-controller failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/helm-controller failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/helm-controller failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: helm-controller9_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helm-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: helm-controller
    control-plane: controller
  name: helm-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helm-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: helm-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --events-addr=http://notification-controller.flux-system.svc.cluster.local./
        - --watch-all-namespaces
        - --log-level=info
        - --log-encoding=json
        - --enable-leader-election
        env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.cpu
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: manager
              resource: limits.memory
        image: fluxcd/helm-controller:v1.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-prom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9440
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: healthz
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: helm-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 600
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

---

kind: NetworkPolicy

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/ingress-nginx:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/ingress-nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

  namespace: ingress-nginx

      memory: 1Gi

      memory: 256Mi

##### FILE: helm-ingress2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/mongo-express:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: YOUR_HOST_DNS_NAME
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: mongo-express-service
            port:
              number: 8081
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: helm-ingress-values.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/mongo-express:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$1
    spec.ingressClassName: nginx
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: mongo-test.datatravels.me
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: mongo-express-service
            port:
              number: 8081
        path: /(.*)
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: mongo-test.datatravels.me
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nginx-test-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /test(.*)
        pathType: Exact

---

##### FILE: helm-mongo-express.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          value: root
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          value: mongodb-0.mongodb-headless
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:

##### FILE: helm-mongo-express1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          value: root
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          value: mongodb-0.mongodb-headless
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

##### FILE: helm-template.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolumeClaim/homarr-config:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: homarr-config
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 50Mi
  storageClassName: k8s-rbd

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/homarr:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: homarr
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: homarr
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.15.4
    helm.sh/chart: homarr-1.3.0
  name: homarr
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: homarr
      app.kubernetes.io/name: homarr
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: homarr
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: homarr
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.15.4
        helm.sh/chart: homarr-1.3.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_ADMIN_GROUP
          value: admin
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_BASE
          value: dc=christensencloud,dc=us
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN
          value: cn=admin,dc=christensencloud,dc=us
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_GROUP_CLASS
          value: groupOfNames
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_GROUP_FILTER_EXTRA_ARG
          value: (|(objectclass=groupofNames)(objectclass=groupofUniqueNames))
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_GROUP_MEMBER_ATTRIBUTE
          value: member
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_GROUP_MEMBER_USER_ATTRIBUTE
          value: dn
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_OWNER_GROUP
          value: admin
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_SEARCH_SCOPE
          value: base
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_URI
          value: ldap://openldap.openldap.svc:389
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_USERNAME_ATTRIBUTE
          value: uid
        - name: AUTH_LDAP_USERNAME_FILTER_EXTRA_ARG
          value: (objectClass=person)
        - name: AUTH_OIDC_ADMIN_GROUP
          value: admin
        - name: AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_NAME
          value: OIDC
        - name: AUTH_OIDC_OWNER_GROUP
          value: admin
        - name: AUTH_OIDC_SCOPE_OVERWRITE
          value: openid email profile groups
        - name: AUTH_PROVIDER
          value: credentials
        - name: DEFAULT_COLOR_SCHEME
          value: dark
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Denver
        image: ghcr.io/ajnart/homarr:0.15.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 7575
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: homarr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7575
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 7575
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        resources: {}
        securityContext: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/data/configs
          name: homarr-config
        - mountPath: /data
          name: homarr-database
        - mountPath: /app/public/icons
          name: homarr-icons
      nodeSelector: {}
      securityContext: {}
      volumes:
      - name: homarr-config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: homarr-config
      - name: homarr-database
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: homarr-database
      - name: homarr-icons
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: homarr-icons

      FromName: true
    DriverInfo:
      Name: ebs.csi.aws.com
      SupportedSizeRange:
        Min: 1Gi
        Max: 16Ti
      SupportedFsType:
        xfs: {}
        ext4: {}
      SupportedMountOption:
        dirsync: {}

        fsGroup: true
        block: true
        exec: true
        snapshotDataSource: true
        pvcDataSource: false
        multipods: true
        controllerExpansion: true
        nodeExpansion: true
        volumeLimits: true
        topology: true

    kind: StorageClass
    apiVersion: storage.k8s.io/v1
    metadata:
      name: ebs.csi.aws.com
    provisioner: ebs.csi.aws.com
    volumeBindingMode: WaitForFirstConsumer

  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: test
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation,hook-succeeded,hook-failed

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/ebs-csi-driver-test:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: test
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation,hook-succeeded,hook-failed
  name: ebs-csi-driver-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - |
      cp /etc/config/storageclass.yaml /workspace/storageclass.yaml
      go install sigs.k8s.io/kubetest2/...@latest
      kubectl config set-cluster cluster --server=https://kubernetes.default --certificate-authority=/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
      kubectl config set-context kubetest2 --cluster=cluster
      kubectl config set-credentials sa --token=$(cat /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token)
      kubectl config set-context kubetest2 --user=sa
      kubectl config use-context kubetest2
      kubetest2 noop --run-id='e2e-kubernetes' --test=ginkgo -- --test-package-version=$(curl https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/stable-1.25.txt) --skip-regex='\[Disruptive\]|\[Serial\]' --focus-regex='External.Storage' --parallel=25 --test-args='-storage.testdriver=/etc/config/manifests.yaml'
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    image: gcr.io/k8s-staging-test-infra/kubekins-e2e:v20220624-1a63fdd9f2-master
    name: kubetest2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/config
      name: config-vol
  restartPolicy: Never
  serviceAccountName: ebs-csi-driver-test
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      name: ebs-csi-driver-test
    name: config-vol

---

##### FILE: high_memory_pod.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/backend-cka06-arch:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: backend-cka06-arch
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - --vm
    - "1"
    - --vm-bytes
    - 600M
    - --vm-hang
    - "1"
    command:
    - stress
    image: polinux/stress
    name: memory-demo-ctr
    resources:
      limits:
        memory: 700Mi
      requests:
        memory: 200Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PriorityClass/kiamol-high:
apiVersion: scheduling.k8s.io/v1
description: High priority - may evict low priority
globalDefault: false
kind: PriorityClass
metadata:
  labels:
    kiamol: ch19
  name: kiamol-high
  namespace: default
value: 10000

##### FILE: high-availability_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/system:aggregated-metrics-reader:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: metrics-server
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-admin: "true"
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-edit: "true"
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-view: "true"
  name: system:aggregated-metrics-reader
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - metrics.k8s.io
  resources:
  - pods
  - nodes
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch

---

##### FILE: high-availability_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/system:metrics-server:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: metrics-server
  name: system:metrics-server
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - nodes/metrics
  verbs:
  - get
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - pods
  - nodes
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch

---

##### FILE: high-availability_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: metrics-server
  name: metrics-server
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: metrics-server
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: metrics-server
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                k8s-app: metrics-server
            namespaces:
            - kube-system
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cert-dir=/tmp
        - --secure-port=4443
        - --kubelet-preferred-address-types=InternalIP,ExternalIP,Hostname
        - --kubelet-use-node-status-port
        - --metric-resolution=15s
        - --kubelet-insecure-tls
        - --requestheader-client-ca-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-ca.pem
        - --requestheader-username-headers=X-Remote-User
        - --requestheader-group-headers=X-Remote-Group
        - --requestheader-extra-headers-prefix=X-Remote-Extra-
        image: m.daocloud.io/registry.k8s.io/metrics-server/metrics-server:v0.6.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /livez
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: metrics-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-dir
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki
          name: ca-ssl
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      serviceAccountName: metrics-server
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/kubernetes/pki
        name: ca-ssl

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cctns-new/Deployment/psa-highcourt-server-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: highcourt-app
  name: psa-highcourt-server-app
  namespace: cctns-new
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: highcourt-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: highcourt-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONFIG_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: config_server_address
              name: psa-config-cm
        - name: HIGHCOURT_DATA_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: highcourt_server_address
              name: psa-highcourt-cm
        - name: EUREKA_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: eureka_server_address
              name: psa-eureka-cm
        - name: APPLICATION_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: ACTIVE_PROFILE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: ACTIVE_PROFILE
              name: active-profile
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Kolkata
        image: docker-registry:5000/psa-highcourt-server:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: highcourt-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8887
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /DATA_APP_C_DIARY
          name: data-app-c-diary
        - mountPath: /DATA2
          name: data2
        - mountPath: /DATA
          name: data
        - mountPath: /root/logs
          name: logs-volume
      serviceAccount: cctns
      serviceAccountName: cctns
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /DATA_APP_C_DIARY
          type: ""
        name: data-app-c-diary
      - hostPath:
          path: /DATA2
          type: ""
        name: data2
      - hostPath:
          path: /DATA
          type: ""
        name: data
      - hostPath:
          path: /Data_NAS_NEW/microservice-log/highcourt
          type: ""
        name: logs-volume

---

##### FILE: high-scale-ipcache.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 50
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        type: server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver:1.10.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/client:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: client
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 50
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: client
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        type: client
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - 1000h
        command:
        - sleep
        image: quay.io/cilium/demo-client:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -sS
            - --fail
            - --connect-timeout
            - "5"
            - -o
            - /dev/null
            - http:80/public
          timeoutSeconds: 7
        name: web
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -sS
            - --fail
            - --connect-timeout
            - "5"
            - -o
            - /dev/null
            - http:80/public
          timeoutSeconds: 7

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: high-stress
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 20
  parallelism: 20
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        job: high-stress
      name: stress-ng-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apt-get update && apt-get install -y stress-ng && stress-ng --cpu 1 --timeout
          60s --metrics-brief
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: ubuntu:latest
        name: stress-ng-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
      nodeName: kind-worker
      restartPolicy: Never

          value: "4002"

          value: mongodb://db:27017

          value: history

          name: history-port

            path: /api/live
            port: 4002
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

            memory: 512Mi

        f:selector: {}

        f:type: {}
    manager: helm
    operation: Update
  name: hivems-postgresql-headless
  namespace: hive-metastore
spec:
  clusterIP: None
  clusterIPs:
  - None
  internalTrafficPolicy: Cluster
  ipFamilies:
  - IPv4
  ipFamilyPolicy: SingleStack
  ports:
  - name: tcp-postgresql
    port: 5432
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: tcp-postgresql
  publishNotReadyAddresses: true
  selector:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hivems
    app.kubernetes.io/name: postgresql
  sessionAffinity: None
  type: ClusterIP
status:
  loadBalancer: {}

---

##### FILE: hive-site-meta-cfg.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/hive-site-cfg:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  hive-site.xml: |
    <?xml version="1.0"?>
    <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="configuration.xsl"?>
    <configuration>
        <!-- Hive Metastore URI -->
        <property>
            <name>hive.metastore.uris</name>
            <value>thrift://hive-metastore-svc.default.svc.cluster.local:30983</value>
            <description>Thrift URI for the remote metastore. Used by metastore client to connect to remote metastore.</description>
        </property>

        <!-- JDBC URL to the Metastore database -->
        <property>
            <name>javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL</name>
            <value>jdbc:mysql://hive-metastore-db.default.svc.cluster.local:13306/metastore_db?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true&amp;useSSL=false</value>
            <description>JDBC connect string for a JDBC metastore</description>
        </property>

        <!-- JDBC Driver class name -->
        <property>
            <name>javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName</name>
            <value>com.mysql.jdbc.Driver</value>
            <description>Driver class name for a JDBC metastore</description>
        </property>

        <!-- Username for the JDBC connection -->
        <property>
            <name>javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName</name>
            <value>root</value>
            <description>username to use against metastore database</description>
        </property>

        <!-- Password for the JDBC connection -->
        <property>
            <name>javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword</name>
            <value>mypass</value>
            <description>password to use against metastore database</description>
        </property>

        <!-- Hive data warehouse location -->
        <property>
            <name>hive.metastore.warehouse.dir</name>
            <value>/data</value>
            <description>location of default database for the warehouse</description>
        </property>
    </configuration>
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  name: hive-site-cfg
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "1"
  generation: 1
  labels:
    app: hog
  name: hog
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hog
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: hog
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: vish/stress
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: hog
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            memory: 2500Mi
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to low-usage-limit/Deployment/hog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "1"
  generation: 1
  labels:
    run: hog
  name: hog
  namespace: low-usage-limit
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: hog
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        run: hog
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -cpus
        - "2"
        - -mem-total
        - 1950Mi
        - -mem-alloc-size
        - 100Mi
        - -mem-alloc-sleep
        - 1s
        image: vish/stress
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: hog
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 2500Mi
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

##### FILE: hog21.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to low-usage-limit/Deployment/hog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "1"
  generation: 1
  labels:
    run: hog
  name: hog
  namespace: low-usage-limit
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: hog
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        run: hog
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -cpus
        - "2"
        - -mem-total
        - 1950Mi
        - -mem-alloc-size
        - 100Mi
        - -mem-alloc-sleep
        - 1s
        image: vish/stress
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: hog
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 2500Mi
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

##### FILE: home-assistant2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/home-assistant:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  configuration.yaml: |
    # Configure a default setup of Home Assistant (frontend, api, etc)
    default_config:

    automation: !include automations.yaml
    script: !include scripts.yaml
    scene: !include scenes.yaml

    # Nginx Proxy stuff
    http:
      base_url: https://jarvis.lab.janissary.xyz
      server_port: 8123
      # For extra security set this to only accept connections on localhost if NGINX is on the same machine
      # Uncommenting this will mean that you can only reach Home Assistant using the proxy, not directly via IP from other clients.
      #server_host: 127.0.0.1
      use_x_forwarded_for: true
      # You must set the trusted proxy IP address so that Home Assistant will properly accept connections
      # Set this to your NGINX machine IP, or localhost if hosted on the same machine.
      trusted_proxies:
        - 0.0.0.0/0
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: home-assistant
  namespace: default

---
