##### FILE: home-assistant3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/home-assistant:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: home-assistant
  name: home-assistant
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: home-assistant
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: home-assistant
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Los_Angeles
        - name: UID
          value: "1024"
        - name: GID
          value: "100"
        image: ghcr.io/home-assistant/home-assistant:2024.11
        name: home-assistant
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8123
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: home-assistant-config
        - mountPath: /config/configuration.yaml
          name: configuration-file
          subPath: configuration.yaml
        - mountPath: /dev/ttyUSB0
          name: zigbee-hardware
      nodeSelector:
        zigbee: "true"
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: home-assistant
        name: configuration-file
      - name: home-assistant-config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: home-assistant-config-claim
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/ttyUSB0
        name: zigbee-hardware

---

##### FILE: home-assistant8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/homeassistant:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: homeassistant
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: homeassistant
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: homeassistant
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/home-assistant/home-assistant:stable
        name: homeassistant
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /run/dbus
          name: dbus
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/prayuj/home-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
        name: localtime
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/dbus
        name: dbus

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/homeassistant-backup:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: homeassistant-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  capacity:
    storage: 108Gi
  csi:
    driver: zfs.csi.openebs.io
    fsType: zfs
    volumeAttributes:
      openebs.io/cas-type: localpv-zfs
      openebs.io/poolname: citerne
    volumeHandle: homeassistant-backup
  nodeAffinity:
    required:
      nodeSelectorTerms:
      - matchExpressions:
        - key: openebs.io/nodeid
          operator: In
          values:
          - kantai3
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: ""
  volumeMode: Filesystem

##### FILE: homeassistant-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to homeassistant/Deployment/homeassistant-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: {}
  name: homeassistant-deployment
  namespace: homeassistant
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: homeassistant
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: homeassistant
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Pacific/Auckland
        image: ghcr.io/home-assistant/home-assistant:stable
        name: homeassistant
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime-volume
          readOnly: true
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: node.kubernetes.io/unreachable
        operator: Exists
        tolerationSeconds: 10
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: node.kubernetes.io/not-ready
        operator: Exists
        tolerationSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: config-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: homeassistant
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
        name: localtime-volume

---

##### FILE: home-assistant-ingress.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to home-assistant/Ingress/home-assistant:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/cloudflare-proxied: "true"
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/hostname: homeassistant.abbottland.io
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: abbottland.io
  labels:
    external-dns-enabled: "true"
  name: home-assistant
  namespace: home-assistant
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: homeassistant.abbottland.io
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: homeassistant
            port:
              number: 8123
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - homeassistant.abbottland.io
    secretName: home-assistant-tls

    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

      app: homebridge

      labels:
        app: homebridge

      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Montreal
        image: homebridge/homebridge:latest
        name: homebridge
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8581
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8581
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /homebridge
          name: homebridge-data
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - name: homebridge-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: homebridge-pvc

##### FILE: home-osb-service_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to osb-stack/Deployment/home-osb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: home-osb
  name: home-osb-deployment
  namespace: osb-stack
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: home-osb
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: home-osb
        network/db-access: "false"
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: alokkusingh/home-osb:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: home-osb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Kolkata
          type: File
        name: tz-config

##### FILE: homepage2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/homepage:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: homepage
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: homepage
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        name: homepage
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/gethomepage/homepage:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: homepage
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/custom.js
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: custom.js
        - mountPath: /app/config/custom.css
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: custom.css
        - mountPath: /app/config/bookmarks.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: bookmarks.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/docker.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: docker.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/kubernetes.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: kubernetes.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/services.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: services.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/settings.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: settings.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/widgets.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: widgets.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/logs
          name: logs
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      enableServiceLinks: true
      serviceAccountName: homepage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: homepage
        name: homepage-config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: logs

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to homepage/Deployment/homepage:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: homepage
  name: homepage
  namespace: homepage
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: homepage
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: homepage
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: HOMEPAGE_ALLOWED_HOSTS
          value: homepage.homelab.rivetcode.com
        image: ghcr.io/gethomepage/homepage:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: homepage
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/custom.js
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: custom.js
        - mountPath: /app/config/custom.css
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: custom.css
        - mountPath: /app/config/bookmarks.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: bookmarks.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/docker.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: docker.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/kubernetes.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: kubernetes.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/services.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: services.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/settings.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: settings.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/widgets.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: widgets.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/logs
          name: logs
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      enableServiceLinks: true
      serviceAccountName: homepage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: homepage
        name: homepage-config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: logs

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
  name: home-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: fashionme.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: home-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: home-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /home(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: home-storage-echo-server_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/home-storage-echo-server:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: ${SECRET_CLUSTER_NAME}.${SECRET_DOMAIN}
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTPS
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/upstream-vhost: echo-server.${STORAGE_DOMAIN}
  name: home-storage-echo-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: external
  rules:
  - host: ${STORAGE_CLUSTER_NAME}-echo-server.${SECRET_DOMAIN}
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: home-storage-echo-server
            port:
              number: 443
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - ${STORAGE_CLUSTER_NAME}-echo-server.${SECRET_DOMAIN}

---

            port:

        path: /

  - hosts:

##### FILE: hooks-pod.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hooks-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hooks-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: kennethreitz/httpbin
    lifecycle:
      postStart:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - echo Hello postStart! > /var/tmp/hello.txt
      preStop:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - sleep 10
    name: hooks-pod

---

kind: Pod

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: kennethreitz/httpbin
    lifecycle:
      postStart:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - echo Hello postStart! > /var/tmp/hello.txt
      preStop:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - sleep 10
    name: hooks-pod

        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:

      target:
        averageValue: 80Mi
        type: AverageValue
    type: Resource

    - /etc/hosts

    - cat

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostaliases-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostaliases-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - /etc/hosts
    command:
    - cat
    image: busybox
    name: cat-hosts
  hostAliases:
  - hostnames:
    - foo.local
    - bar.local
    ip: 127.0.0.1
  - hostnames:
    - foo.remote
    - bar.remote
    ip: 10.1.2.3
  restartPolicy: Never

              number: 80

        pathType: Exact

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/host-based-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/default-backend: default-http-backend
  name: host-based-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: ingress-nginx.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nginx-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: ingress-django.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: django-service
            port:
              number: 8000
        path: /demo
        pathType: Prefix

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pentest
    type: deployment
  name: hostipc-exec-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pentest
      type: deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pentest
        type: deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - while true; do sleep 30; done;
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - --
        image: ubuntu
        name: hostipc-exec-deployment
      hostIPC: true

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: ambassador
  name: my-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: hello-world
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /hello
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: dogpic-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /dog
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: host-path-volume.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hostpath:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hostpath
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hostpath
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: hostpath
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "3600"
        image: busybox
        name: hostpath
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: var-log
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: var-log

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/hostpath failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: host-path-volume1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/host-path-volume:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: volume
  name: host-path-volume
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: host-path-volume
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: host-path-volume
      name: host-path-volume-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "4000"
        image: busybox
        name: host-path-volume-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /uyster/log
          name: var-log
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: var-log

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: host-pathvolumes1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/pod1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: pod1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do count=$((count+1)); echo Hello${count}-chaitu | tee -a /cache/index.html;
      sleep 5;done
    image: alpine
    name: c1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /cache
      name: nginxvol
  - image: nginx
    name: c2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/
      name: nginxvol
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /tmp/nginxVol
      type: Directory
    name: nginxvol

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/host-pv:
apiVersion: v1

##### FILE: host-volume.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/test-pd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: test-pd
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: test-container
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /test-pd
      name: test-volume
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /data
    name: test-volume

---
